thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: Used FlightHub to book an upcoming trip to Naples and Malta. Ticket prices were very good compared to other sites. E-tickets arrived very quickly with airline booking reference numbers noted. Booking was an extremely easy process. I also had to call FlightHub to cancel an insurance I accidentally purchased while booking. Wait time for my call to be answered was no more than 5 minutes and issue was resolved immediately and without difficulty. Agent was very professional and helpful. A very positive experience using FlightHub for the first time. I will certainly use them again for future travel.
